caption:
Stick With Us—literally 😉💫⁠
⁠
Our Triple Fix Skin Tint Blurring Foundation Sticks are more than just makeup—they’re a movement. This 3-in-1 serum, primer, and foundation melts into skin to blur texture and leave behind a natural, breathable finish that keeps you glowing ✨⁠
⁠
And the best part? Sticking with us feels uplifting—because you deserve to feel confident in your skin without compromising on your skin’s health, without breaking the bank, and without settling for shades that don’t see you.⁠
⁠
👑 Clean, skin-loving ingredients⁠
🌍 Sustainable & conscious packaging⁠
🌟 True inclusion with shades that show up for everyone⁠
🛍️ Accessible luxury that respects your budget⁠
⁠
Available now at @Sephora & Sephora at @Kohl’s⁠
⁠
This is clean beauty that looks good, feels good, and does good. So... are YOU sticking with us? 💗
